items.question: What is the official mint price in 2025?
items.answer: The official mint price will be set at $10,000 per NFT. The pre-mint offers significant discounts, making it the best time to join.

items.question: How can I whitelist my wallet?
items.answer: You can whitelist your wallet by submitting your email or wallet address through the form below or by contacting us directly.

items.question: What happens after the private-mint?
items.answer: After the pre-mint, NFTs will no longer be available at this discounted price. They will be sold at the official mint price in 2025.
